name: MEC Skipper Sunglasses - Unisex
description: Ahoy! The Skipper Sunglasses have quality polarized lenses to dim the glare from water and reflective surfaces. Their deep wrap provides side coverage and UV blocking from all angles.Frame fits medium sized heads.Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses.8-base curvature hugs the contour of your head, protecting you from all angles.Rubber temple tips and nose pads offer a comfortable fit, that doesn’t shift around.Polarized lenses cut glare and keep vision clear in challenging conditions, making them great for use around water or any reflective surface (pavement, snow, clouds, etc.).Grey lens with blue mirror has 15% visible light transmission.Brown lens has 12% visible light transmission.
